title: Lost the ability to gain loot because the client would not let me connect
body: Why am i being punished because the client decided to shit out and not let me reconnect even though my internet was working perfectly and no matter how many times i restarted the client it kept saying "check your connection and restart the game" over and over and over. I was watching a stream and looking for boards posts the entire time i was trying to connect so it was NOT my internet connection.

replies.body: Hey there, I'm not seeing any restrictions on your account regarding hextech.  The only restriction that could even occur is restrictions on collecting chests post-game, so you would be able to use hextech crafting without issue.  Your issue is likely being caused by an unstable connection specifically to our services, which can happen regardless of how good your internet is.  You should run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and tighten up your network.
